1�I never dreamed the day would come when your kind would once again fly free in Vana'diel...
1� , I am most grateful to you.
1�I have nothing but gratitude towards San d'Oria.Why would I sympathize with the plight of a spiteful child...?4
1�I am Erpalacion.I have met you before at the Tomb of King Ranperre. You were the dragonslayer.
1�I am Erpalacion.And you must be the dragonslayer.
1�There is an explanation for that...It was the night of our triumphant homecoming...
1�And so, following the king's plan, I retired with my wyvern to the mountains.
1�Thankfully, the unholy mark that blighted my wyvern faded, but by that time, I was too old to leave those snow-capped peaks. So, I decided to spend my remaining days raising a new wyvern.
1�I left this life with my dream still unrealized...But now I see that there were others who carried out my final wish. You have given new life to the race of dragons.
1�Now is the time for me to return to my eternal slumber. Allow me a moment with this wyvern child.
1�Grow strong, little one...The life that pulses within you is not yours alone. You hold the spark of all the wyverns that were denied life in this world...
1�I'm afraid not, Your Majesty.This is only the beginning.You must turn your efforts towards rebuilding this war-ravaged country.
1�About that, Your Majesty...
1�...I must apologize, but I can no longer remain here in San d'Oria. Forgive me, Your Majesty.
1�I... During the course of this insurgence, an unholy sign has appeared upon my wyvern. In the heat of battle we slew those that have no sins to answer for. This is our punishment.
1�I believe that dragons teach us the folly of our ways. To restore the holy sign, I must go where no people dwell and spend the rest of my life in quiet solitude.
1�Your Majesty, I must ask you to assist me in convincing others that I had perished in battle.

1�If it is known that I still live, I will be hounded incessantly by foreign assassins, or those who hunger for a return to the days of war. The only way I can cast aside my bloodstained lance is to be dead in the eyes of the world.
1�That being said, you must know that I can never meet with Your Majesty again.
1�My liege, you have my deepest gratitude...
1�...As you wish, Your Majesty.
1�Hm... It seems my trap was of little consequence after all. Not altogether unexpected.
1�However, I am skilled in more than just swordplay. I have also conquered the arts of necromancy.With the helm of the last dragoon I will resurrect the spirit of Erpalacion.
1�He was betrayed by his home of San d'Oria, as was I.He will understand my need for revenge...!
1�What are you waiting for, dragoon?As I was dismissed from my position of command, you were exiled from San d'Oria by King Ranperre.
1�Now is our chance to exact our vengeance upon the kingdom that betrayed us.Let this adventurer be the first to be sentenced in our trial of blood!
1�This is not the way it's supposed to be...!4
1�Ancolain B Feulart, I hereby arrest you on charges of theft and violence against the Court of San d'Oria.

1�I waited for you, Ancolain, believing that you would come to your senses and recognize your mistakes. Your position as second in command had been held vacant for your return. It's a shame things had to turn out like this, but you'll have time to reflect upon your sins in jail.
1�That armor! It can't be. The last dragoon...!
1�Then, that time...! I never thought it was real...
1�If you are truly the last dragoon, then there is something that I must ask you.Why did the wise King Ranperre give you such an unreasonable order?
1�The last dragoon...He was a man worthy of the title.
1�You have performed your duty well.We will escort Ancolain back to San d'Oria and quash these rumors that dishonor the last dragoon.You have the gratitude of the Royal Knights.
1�As Erpalacion stated, you and your wyvern have an important destiny to fulfill. Keep that in mind, and take good care of your winged companion....Until we meet again.
1�Erpalacion, it is all finally over...
1�Yes...you are right.And you will be here to help us, I trust?Without your strength, the insurrection would have been a difficult thing to put down...
1�What is it, Erpalacion?Surely you're not considering retirement at your tender years!There are still many endeavors that will require your abilities.
1�What is this you speak of? Tell me why this must be.
1�Great Goddess...! Even as a dragonslayer, I failed to notice the sign.Forgive me, Erpalacion...
1�I see...Well, I have no right to prevent you from leaving.If there is anything I can do, you must let me know.
1�What are you saying, Erpalacion?
1�!!!To go to such extremes...That I must lose the one person who understands me so well...
1�However, I must not keep you here for my sake; you have your own road to travel....I will send you on an expedition. Use the opportunity to disappear from this land.
1�I have no doubt that every citizen in this kingdom will be present for your state funeral.
1�Tonight marks our final farewell. At the very least, we should empty a few glasses and talk until the dawn. What say you?
1�Leave this room?Yes.No.
1�Is the truth not handed down through the generations?Surely thou hast not lost the power of Horutoto given to the first Star Sibyl?
1�This cannot be!If what thou sayest be truth, the great beast of the moon will be unleashed upon the land!
1�Is the ??Diza Star?? given to the first Star Sibyl yet within thy possession?
1�I will use my power to return magic to the tome. My strength pales in comparison to that of the moon, however...
1�The contents of the book will soon fade, but I pray that this act may be of some small assistance.
y!�Perhaps I have kept you waiting too long...and what is this? Thou hast brought companions along?
1�Never did I expect such bustle and commotion in such forgotten ruins as these.
1�Well, thou certainly dost bring a most curious conundrum. A future wrapped in pure darkness.
1�Then thou must travel to a place that holds a grand crystal and traverse the boundaries connecting this realm to Hers.
1�Alas, only the dead are able to cross into the realm of spirits.
1�Though perhaps...Perhaps the terrestrial avatars, blessed as they are by the crystals, can provide an alternative method.
1�Perhaps it hath something to do with these strange feelings I have...
1�Surely this cometh as a surprise to thee, but by all rights I am already dead, yet have not returned to the crystal as I should.
1�I can still feel the yearning, calling to me from beyond.
1�Yet unlike me, he does not remain in this world for want of something to hold onto. And his name...is Selh'teus.
1�Thou art familiar with him? Then mayhap I can skip the long-winded explanation.
1�Perhaps I can avoid the long-winded explanation. Selh'teus is able to cross the boundaries between this world and the next.
1�Yet one question remains--how canst thou meet him?
1�I must reiterate that thou must first cross over via the crystal, and to do that requires one to guide thee.
1�The three of ye have faith in Altana, do ye not?
1�Then it shall be but a small task for thee to visit the crystal.
1�Deep beneath the earth slumber five stones, each of which containeth an inordinate amount of power.
1�Three are located beneath the spires of Holla, Dem, and Mea.
1�Then that only serveth to prove that thy bonds with the Goddess are taut and firm.
1�Perhaps they shall resonate with the crystals and provide the answers thou seekest.
1�I have shared with thee all I am privy to. The rest is for thee and thy companions to decide.
1�Yet I cannot say what to expect even shouldst thou succeed. Ensure that thou remainest prepared for any eventuality.
1�Zee members of zee Rhinosterie, however, were not happy with his research. Zey are happy believing zat our ancestors were guided by a wondrous star--zee same star zat watches over us.
1�But Iru-Kuiru must have discovered something on his sojourn to zee Northlands. It was enough to make him leave zee Rhinosterie and find his way here...
1�To let me know zat.
1�...I can't even begin to understand it, but if it's zee towers of zee Horutoto Ruins you are referring to, they ceased to function twenty years ago...
1�...Zee Kuluu elder vanished in zat burst of light.
1�Oh, and please tell Leepe-Hoppe zat I'm safe and sound. When I'm done reading Iru-Kuiru's research, I will return to Windurst.
1�...I've started to get zee shakes after all zat. What a strange experience we've just been through!
1�A workbook written by Iru-Kuiru.
1�??That place was most definitely cursed. It was as if each of us were having our strings pulled by some unseen force...??
1�??The Goddess only knows what that power was. I knew fear like I had never known before, and was struck mindless with panic before the terror that lurked within those walls.??
1�A diary written by Iru-Kuiru.
1�??A letter has arrived from the homeland. The San d'Orian member of the Allied Expedition, Francmage M Mistalle, has lost his life to the curse...??
1�??And then yesterday, my friend and fellow Allied explorer, Yow Rabntah, was taken from this world...??
1�??I can feel the shadow closing in on me. I believe the darkness will claim me before I am able to finish this research. And I was so close to putting all the pieces of this legend together...??
1�A tome written on the subject of Fei'Yin.
1�??I would like to bring attention to the many small chambers that exist in the subterranean levels of the ruins of Fei'Yin.??
1�??In each of these chambers stands an automaton. A golem, or giant, if you will. Were these golems given the task of sentry, or simply employed as servants???

1�??It is possible to conclude from the artifacts discovered in these ruins that it was once the abode of an ancient people. One can further deduce from the evidence that this civilization was wiped out by some sudden calamity.??
1�Something lies under the rubble.
1�A haunting song suddenly echoes throughout the ruins...
1�Chop!Chop!!Chop!!!Chop!!!!

1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
1�Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.

1�Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.
1�Atmacite is the physical agglomeration of a monster's soul, and a vessel for its feral instincts.By infusing atmacite to one's body using 6????, it is possible to enhance one's battle prowess.
1�Be aware, however, that powers granted by atmacite can be tapped only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Atmacite is resilient and will not be expended in the infusion process.
1�Furthermore, infused atmacite will remain in place until voluntarily purged.
1�As the configuration of atmacite is not possible during an operation, be sure to see to your battle preparations ahead of time.
1�Cruor can be used to enrich atmacite, enhancing its potency. The amount of cruor required for enrichment and the resultant properties vary with atmacite.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages to a maximum of level 
�.
1�All Voidwatchers are urged to make atmacite enrichment a priority, for they might just mean the difference between life and death.
1�Periapt are lucky charms that grant myriad beneficial effects ranging from improved vitality to general upturns in fortune.
1�Especially sought after are those bestowing temporary items at the commencement of an operation, granting combatants a distinct advantage against the enemy.
1�Although their acquisition can only be described as arduous, the benefits make them well worth the effort.

1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
1�Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.

1�Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.
1�Atmacite is the physical agglomeration of a monster's soul, and a vessel for its feral instincts.By infusing atmacite to one's body using 6????, it is possible to enhance one's battle prowess.
1�Be aware, however, that powers granted by atmacite can be tapped only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.
1�Atmacite is resilient and will not be expended in the infusion process.
1�Furthermore, infused atmacite will remain in place until voluntarily purged.
1�As the configuration of atmacite is not possible during an operation, be sure to see to your battle preparations ahead of time.
1�Cruor can be used to enrich atmacite, enhancing its potency. The amount of cruor required for enrichment and the resultant properties vary with atmacite.

1�Atmacite can be enriched in stages to a maximum of level 
�.
1�All Voidwatchers are urged to make atmacite enrichment a priority, for they might just mean the difference between life and death.
1�Periapt are lucky charms that grant myriad beneficial effects ranging from improved vitality to general upturns in fortune.
1�Especially sought after are those bestowing temporary items at the commencement of an operation, granting combatants a distinct advantage against the enemy.
1�Although their acquisition can only be described as arduous, the benefits make them well worth the effort.
